summary: An orphan, Josefa, runs away from her threatening uncle with whom she is living, and stows away on traveller Fændrik's boat. She is no better off with him, however, as he forces himself on ... See full summary »
cast: Alfred Maurstad|Lars Tvinde|Guri Stormoen|Sonja Wigert|Oscar Egede-Nissen|Henny Skjønberg|Carsten Winger|Sigurd Magnussøn|Marit Halset|Karin Meyer|Per Berge|Aagot Didriksen|Gøril Havrevold|Joachim Holst-Jensen|Abigael Heber Magnussøn|Toralv Maurstad|Marie Olsen|Espen Skjønberg|Eugen Skjønberg|Einar Tveito|Gudrun Tvinde
title: Fant
